Directions.1: Combine almond flour, coconut flour, ginger, cinnamon, allspice, baking soda, nutmeg, and salt in a bowl. Whisk almond butter, honey, and melted coconut oil together in a separate bowl. Pour wet ingredients into dry and mix together until a dough forms.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

Directions.3: Form dough into balls, then press to flatten onto the prepared baking sheet using the palm of the hand, the back of a spoon, or a fork.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are browned but still soft, 15 to 18 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove cookies from oven and let cool 5 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack to cool completely; store in an airtight container to keep cookies crispy.
